subject: Re: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: ... This approach stops working as soons as you have test related classes which don t follow the Test* pattern, eg. stub, mock or test helper classes. Johannes
messageBody:
r_waldhoff wrote:
>
> If you want to keep the test and source files in the same source tree
> (I've used both and think I prefer it that way), then I *think* this
> will work:
>
> <javadoc>
> <fileset dir="${src}">
> <exclude name="**/Test*.java"/>
> </fileset>
> </javadoc>
>

This approach stops working as soons as you have test related classes
which don't follow the Test* pattern, eg. stub, mock or test helper
classes.

Johannes
